hero_subtitle: A next-generation blockchain network for the global K-POP community
about_text: Hallyu Chain (HALL) powers the global K-POP fandom economy with transparent, secure transactions on a decentralized network where fans and artists connect directly. Join today to support your favorite stars and shape the future of fandom.
about_benefit1: Vote on exclusive content and events
about_benefit2: Connect with artists through token-based experiences
about_text2: HALL offers user-friendly wallets and cross-chain bridges, enabling fans to participate with ease.
about_text3: Through decentralized governance, fans and investors take part directly in project decisions.
about_mission_list1: Connect fans and artists through a decentralized platform
about_mission_list2: Build a transparent and fair reward system
about_usecases_list1: Voting and governance within fan communities
about_benefits_list1: Rewards and special privileges for holding tokens
about_benefits_list2: Access diverse services via global partnerships
feat1_text: Platform where fans can join projects and share ideas
feat2_text: Transparent system for supporting favorite artists
feat3_text: A worldwide fan community beyond language and borders
dao_text: Hallyu Chain is steered by HALL holders through on-chain proposals and votes.
footer_text: Â© 2026 Hallyu Chain. Information on this site is not investment advice.
newsletter_text: Get the latest updates and airdrop news straight to your inbox.
faq_a1: Hallyu Chain is a blockchain-based digital asset for the K-POP community.
faq_a2: Tokens can be acquired through official airdrops or partner exchanges.
faq_q3: How do I stake my tokens?
faq_a3: Use our staking guide to lock HALL and earn rewards.
corporate_hero_subtitle: Our brand values and visual identity
corporate_brand_text: Hallyu Chain's identity blends vibrant pop culture with cutting-edge blockchain innovation.
corporate_mission_text: Our mission is to connect K-POP fans worldwide through innovative blockchain solutions.
corporate_vision_text: Our vision is a borderless cultural ecosystem powered by Hallyu Chain.
corporate_voice_text: Our voice is passionate, inclusive, and community-driven.
corporate_logo_usage: Follow these rules when using the logo:
corporate_logo_clearspace: Maintain clear space equal to the symbol's height around the logo.
corporate_logo_minimum: Minimum display size is 24px in width for legibility.
corporate_logo_background: Use on solid light or dark backgrounds; use hall-symbol-dark.svg on light backgrounds and hall-symbol-light.svg on dark backgrounds.
notice_lang_unavailable: Selected language unavailable. Using default language.
alt_daniel: Portrait of Daniel Kim, CEO & Co-Founder
alt_michael: Portrait of Michael Park, Lead Blockchain Engineer
